scripts.build: mkdir -p 'Token Beam.sketchplugin/Contents/Sketch' && mkdir -p 'Token Beam.sketchplugin/Contents/Resources/ui' && cp manifest.json 'Token Beam.sketchplugin/Contents/Sketch/' && cp src/plugin.js 'Token Beam.sketchplugin/Contents/Sketch/' && cp ui/index.html 'Token Beam.sketchplugin/Contents/Resources/ui/' && cp ui/ui.js 'Token Beam.sketchplugin/Contents/Resources/ui/'
